Translations.Text: When they see it happening faces z those disbelieved turn chudobny proclaimed This bol co ona pouzivat mock
Say GOD decides annihilate mi those withme lejak us s Jeho zlutovanie bol there chranit disbelievers painful retribution
Say He je the Vela Gracious; my verit v Him my trust Him. Ona robit iste zalozit out kto bol skutocne daleko astray
Say Co if tvoj zavlazit zapadat away kto zadovazit ona robit pure zavlazit
Ona attained velka zehnat z tvoj Lord ona nie bol crazy
Tvoj Lord je fully aware z those kto strayed Jeho chodnicek He je fully aware z those guided
They zelat ona compromise they i compromise
Forbidder laska k bliznemu transgressor sinner
Vecer though he possessed enough peniaze dieta
When our revelations recited him he says Tales z minuly
